feed.title: Google Cloud: Cloud Interconnect
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Cloud Interconnect

entry.content:
Cross-Site Interconnect (Preview) support is available in the following colocation facilities:

  • Equinix Dallas (DA1), Dallas
  • Equinix Miami (MI1), Miami

For more information, see the Locations table and Global Locations.
entry.summary: Cross-Site Interconnect support is now available in Equinix Dallas and Miami facilities.
entry.title: Feature: Cross-Site Interconnect Now Available in Dallas and Miami

entry.content: Custom IP address ranges are available for Cloud Interconnect in Preview. For more information, see Custom IP address ranges.
entry.title: Feature: Cloud Interconnect Custom IP Ranges Now in Preview

entry.content:
Interconnect connection groups and VLAN attachment groups are Generally available. You can use resource groups to communicate your intended level of reliability, and to receive feedback on how your Cloud Interconnect resources meet that intended level of reliability.

For more information, see Resiliency and SLA options.
entry.summary: Interconnect connection groups and VLAN attachment groups are now generally available. You can utilize resource groups to communicate your reliability intentions and receive feedback on how your Cloud Interconnect resources align with them.
entry.title: Feature: Interconnect connection groups and VLAN attachment groups are now generally available.

entry.content:
Cross-Site Interconnect (Preview) support is available in the following colocation facilities:

  • Melbourne, Australia

For more information, see the Locations table and Global Locations.
entry.summary: Cross-Site Interconnect is now available in Melbourne, Australia. For more details, check the locations table and global locations.
entry.title: Feature: Cross-Site Interconnect support in Melbourne
